list.title: Create Personalised Categories
list.description: Access your medications swiftly by navigating through your personalized categories. Whether you're managing prescriptions or food supplements, our app ensures an organized and hassle-free experience, putting your health in your hands.

list.title: Scan Barcode for Quick Input
list.description: Accelerate the input process by scanning the barcode on your medication or food supplement package. Our app effortlessly retrieves essential information, saving you time and ensuring accuracy.

list.title: Real-time Expiry Tracking and Notifications
list.description: Optimize your inventory management with the addition of expiration dates and comprehensive tracking at your fingertips. Receive timely notifications for expiring medications, ensuring you stay informed and can promptly remove them from your inventory.
